extendedInfo.description: With new, hand-selected music added daily, Indie Shuffle lets you listen to curated playlists of the best electronic, remixes, hip-hop, indie rock, folk + more! Simply find a track and hit play; we build a playlist to do the rest of the work to help you find new artists and music.Indie Shuffle is the first step in your music discovery. We want to help you find music you love. HIGHLIGHTS:â¢ Free smart music playlistsâ¢ Absolutely no ads!â¢ No listening limitâ¢ Favorite tracks to create and save personal playlistsâ¢ Share songs you love via Facebook and Twitterâ¢ Tracks curated by real people (aka a team of music enthusiasts only posts about the best jams)For more details, check out www.indieshuffle.com/apps

reviews.title: Great App for a Great Blog
reviews.comment: I love the features. I have almost every feature on the full site. Download links in the app would be even better.
reviews.author: Austin Powell

reviews.title: Good to me, but isn\'t enough!!
reviews.comment: I like this app, i am use it as a radio at my job. But it wil be more uses if the search of music wil be more detailed, to choise the same artist o genre include few properties. Sorry to my English..

reviews.title: Best!
reviews.comment: I love the fact that you can just put this on and always listen to something great. Thanks esteemed panel of humanoid judges who select this great music!
reviews.author: Oelrich van Biljon

reviews.title: Super cool
reviews.comment: I love this app, it\'s great! Could be a little less confusing in the way it\'s organized, but it\'s a wonderful app.
reviews.author: Aimee Apparatus

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: I have found a surprising amount of good music through this app. so far, I love it, despite the text that the interface took a while to fully understand. five stars!
reviews.author: Heather Loberger

reviews.title: Fun and a great way to find new music
reviews.comment: It would be nice to play a genre in order for instance by searching \'nu disco\' it would continue to play those songs. Similarly, for one artist\'s search result you could choose to play the list - of course this contradicts the whole shuffle idea but it\'s nice to have options :)
reviews.author: SunshineHQ

reviews.title: Awesome songs but sometimes very laggy
reviews.comment: Doesnt load my playlist at times even when using wifi.always says operation time out. Othr than tht its awesome.
reviews.author: Adam Suharto

reviews.title: Great but why do I have to have Facebook?
reviews.comment: So annoying when Devs assume everyone uses Facebook. We don\'t. In protest I will not use apps which require Facebook login to use all functions.
reviews.author: Adam Stephenson

reviews.title: Un-heard music
reviews.comment: Most the tracks I have never heard of and its a clean easy to mange app. I use it to uncover new musicians etc. Its good.
reviews.author: james tomlin

reviews.title: Thanks for the help
reviews.comment: I just want to say thanks to the developers.  They suggested re installing tyre app and it now works so I can like songs. Thanks for the help
reviews.author: Nathan Stasin

reviews.comment: Stupendous app to go along with the best music blog around.
reviews.author: Connor Hancovsky

reviews.title: It feels good
reviews.comment: Fresh and connected
reviews.author: Jamie McConnell

reviews.title: Needs update
reviews.comment: The music is amazing! But the app is barely usable. It freezes and I have to force close after about five or six songs.  Google galaxy nexus by Samsung, Android 4.2.2
reviews.author: Adam Wanninger

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I use indie to find all my new music, only suggestions I have is the ability to Crewe your own playlists, share those playlists and for longer description to be expandable in the app. Also would love to see a widget and be able to control from the hold screen like with last.fm.
reviews.author: Duncan Jones

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite app at the moment! Its great for any indie music from hip-hop, indie pop/rock and electronic. I Highly recommend it!
reviews.author: alex Rogers

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Such a great app. It\'s my favorite music app right now.
reviews.author: Lambert Touneh

reviews.title: Great at first
reviews.comment: Ive had this app for many many months and it was my favorite app. But now none of the songs will play. I tried to reinstall and that didnt work either. My favorites dont even work. What a shame!
reviews.author: Turahn Gordon

reviews.title: I love this app!
reviews.comment: It works much better than other music streaming apps I\'ve tried like 8tracks and cbc music (Canadian radio). I would LOVE if there was a widget, but otherwise this app is perfect.
reviews.author: Zoe Bernstein

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Great app. Always provides good music for every mood.
reviews.author: Salar Alam

reviews.title: Preatty good
reviews.comment: If its posible put more rtock bands
reviews.author: juan sebastian Molina
